title: Hour 1: Net Loss
description:
"We all knew they was gonna get their spanking last night." Kendrick Perkins is not surprised the Nets got beat by the Pelicans. Stephen A is very encouraged by the Knicks following their overtime loss to the Grizzlies. Plus Dan Orlovsky joins the show to breakdown Tua and Dak's comeback this weekend. Lastly, Damien Woody says the return of Hopkins could be huge for the Cardinals offense.
